TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_John_Magufuli, title = John_Magufuli, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Magufuli} }

S.FORM: I 1959 a miheca saka 10 folad saka 29 a romi'ad masofoc ci John Magufuli , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Tanzania anini i ci John Magufuli, patirengan a romi'ad i 2015 a miheca saka 11 folad saka 5 a romi'ad.

I 1959 a miheca saka 10 folad saka 29 a romi'ad masofoc ci John Magofoli , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Tanzania anini i ci John Magofoli, patirengan a romi'ad i 2015 a miheca saka 11 folad saka 5 a romi'ad.
